Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Paulette G. Hugie
Reviews.Content: This kit with the camera was the best buy around.  The product was better than expected.  The camera works great.

Reviews.Title: Camera for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Krissy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas. I researched for weeks looking at Best Buy, Target , Walmart etc.. No one had anything near as good as Amazons price and no one had the complete package! My daughter loves it abd is taking great pics! She is an art student abd needed a camera to takes pics for her portfolio- this camera was the perfect choice!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera for the $$
Reviews.Author: D. J. Mckinstry
Reviews.Content: I have owned a few digital cameras but never a Canon.  I was influenced by the reviews from other people who had bought this camera.  Everything they said was true and it is a great camera.  It came with an extra battery but it has exceptional battery life anyway.I would highly recommend this camera for someone who doesn't want to mess with alot of buttons.  This is a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: mrnatural55
Reviews.Content: Excellent package! Everything you need for quick start up. Even the tripod was included. Would highly recommend this package for someone looking for a a small portable camera with all the bells and whistles. Takes excellent shots; clear and steady.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Vera June
Reviews.Content: The camera takes a  very nice picture.  The bundle is very handy, and I'm glad I purchased it at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Purchase
Reviews.Author: V. DeWitt
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old and he has become a camera addict like his dad:). Takes decent pictures & we will soon be printing his memories.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL
Reviews.Author: C. Singleton "ladynred"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY CAMERA AND ALL OF THE ACCESSORIES THAT CAME WITH IT. THE PICTURE IS CLEAR AND COLOR IS AWESOME

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Juac Carlos H
Reviews.Content: For the price is a very good purchase but if you spec to mucho on this camera I would say is a basic home camera

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Got this package for my girlfriend and she loved it. We were out a little while ago and she left her phone somewhere so I decided to replace her old one. She was really happy and excited about the additional items. Also the USB plug in for the SD card is key.

Reviews.Title: Great camera great bundle price
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: It arrived very quick..it has a lot to offer for the price..it was a gift for 13 yr old granddaughter and she loved it!!  Her mother set it all up for her and she said everything is fine and it takes great pictures...I guess we can't ask for more than that.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 9 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image Stabilized Zoom 28mm Wide-Angle Lens with 720p HD Video Recording (Black)
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Additional NB-11L Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery - Deluxe Design Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pocket & Strap -
Flexible Legged Mini Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit  - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - BONUS!! FREE 25 Quality Prints (promo code# on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image Stabilized Zoom (Black) + NB-11L Battery + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
